title: A Faster Horse
description: To celebrate the Ford Mustang's 50th anniversary, an automotive engineer takes the beloved muscle car into the future while preserving its legacy.

title: A Grand Night In: The Story of Aardman
description: Aardman Animations icons Wallace & Gromit, Morph and more join fans and collaborators for a retrospective celebrating the studio's 40th anniversary.

title: A Gray State
description: This documentary dissects the case of a filmmaker whose death, along with the deaths of his wife and daughter, sparked alt-right conspiracy theories.

title: A Leaf of Faith
description: This documentary takes a deep dive into the benefits, dangers and lingering questions around Kratom leaf as an alternative to opioid painkillers.

title: A Life of Its Own: The Truth About Medical Marijuana
description: Award-winning journalist Helen Kapalos explores the subject of medical marijuana, uncovering life-changing treatments and cutting-edge research.

title: A Murder in the Park
description: This documentary excoriates a noted anti-death-penalty activist and his team, whose questionable methods got a convicted killer freed in 1999.

title: A New Economy
description: This film spotlights companies and individuals who are building a new economy by employing nontraditional business models that look beyond profit.

title: A Plastic Ocean
description: When he discovers the world's oceans brimming with plastic waste, a documentary filmmaker investigates the pollution's environmental impacts.

title: A Small Good Thing
description: In this documentary shot over the course of a year, six Berkshires residents choose holistic lifestyles that deepen bonds of family and community.

title: A Week in Watts
description: Los Angeles police officers embark on an innovative program mentoring promising students from the harsh, gang-infested Watts neighborhood.

title: A Year in Champagne
description: Follow grape growers, famed vintners, aficionados and experts through the complex wine-making process unique to France's famous Champagne region.

title: A&E: When Patients Attack
description: The security staff of Queen Elizabeth Hospital in Birmingham, U.K., is constantly kept on its feet by aggressive patients. This is their story.

title: Abacus: Small Enough to Jail
description: Scapegoated in the wake of the 2008 financial crisis, an immigrant family indicted for fraud fights to defend the legacy of their small Chinatown bank.

title: Abstract: The Art of Design
description: Step inside the minds of the most innovative designers in a variety of disciplines and learn how design impacts every aspect of life.
actors: Christoph Niemann, Tinker Hatfield, Es Devlin, Bjarke Ingels

title: Accidental Courtesy
description: This documentary follows African American musician Daryl Davis, who's been making it his mission to meet and greet racists to change their minds.

title: Addicted to Sexting
description: This light-hearted documentary examines the phenomenon of erotic text messaging, talking about it with both pundits and participants.

title: After Porn Ends 2
description: Retired porn stars reflect on their experiences in the adult film industry, sharing successes and struggles, fond memories and regrets.

title: After the Raves
description: Acclaimed DJ Tommie Sunshine unpacks uniquely inspiring stories from the controversial world of electronic dance music (EDM).

title: Ai Weiwei: Never Sorry
description: Chinese artist and activist Ai Weiwei uses social media and art to inspire protests and suffers government persecution for his actions.

title: Aileen Wuornos: The Selling of a Serial Killer
description: This mesmerizing documentary explores the troubled life and deadly end of serial killer Aileen Wuornos, a woman who murdered johns.

title: Aileen: Life and Death of a Serial Killer
description: Documentarian Nick Broomfield trains his lens on infamous serial killer Aileen Wuornos, who began her murder spree in 1989.

title: Alien Autopsy: Fact or Fiction?
description: This documentary presents gruesome footage of military doctors conducting an alien autopsy in 1947, which was exposed as a hoax after the show aired.

title: Alien Contact: Outer Space
description: This fact-based account delves into humankind's efforts to gather signals from possible intelligent beings beyond the solar system.

title: Alive and Kicking
description: Take an inside look at swing dancing's continued prosperity and the lively and joyous personalities that make the art form so unique.

title: AlphaGo
description: Seemingly simple but deceptively complex, the game of "Go" serves as the backdrop for this battle between artificial intelligence and man.

title: Amanda Knox
description: She was twice convicted and acquitted of murder. Amanda Knox and the people closest to her case speak out in this illuminating documentary.

title: Amelia: A Tale of Two Sisters
description: Eight decades after her disappearance, Amelia Earhart's incredible accomplishments are still celebrated, thanks in large part to her sister Muriel.

title: American Anarchist
description: This documentary profiles William Powell, who wrote the "The Anarchist Cookbook" in the early 1970s and spent his later life regretting his actions.

title: American Experience: Rachel Carson
description: This life portrait honors nature author Rachel Carson, whose writings led to new laws on pesticides and ushered in an environmental movement.

title: American Experience: Ruby Ridge
description: A botched attempt to arrest a white supremacist in Idaho results in a gun battle, a standoff and three deaths that galvanize public opinion in 1992.
actors: Dave Hunt, Bo Gritz, Sara Weaver

title: American Experience: Tesla
description: Inventor and genius Nikola Tesla, whose ideas revolutionized the use of electricity, envisioned technology that became indispensable decades later.

title: American Experience: The Battle of Chosin
description: Months into the Korean War, U.S. troops at North Korea's Chosin Reservoir engaged in a bloody winter battle that would change the conflict's course.

title: American Experience: The Race Underground
description: In late-1800s Boston, a vision for the first subway in the U.S. overcomes opposition and technical setbacks, setting a bold precedent for other cities.

title: American Masters: This Is Bob Hope
description: This Emmy-winning PBS series celebrates the life of iconic entertainer Bob Hope, whose eight-decade long career delighted audiences around the world.

title: American Revolutionary: The Evolution of Grace Lee Boggs
description: This documentary captures philosopher and social activist Grace Lee Boggs at age 97, still promoting justice and equality at home and abroad.

title: Animal House
description: Animals across the globe reveal themselves to be natural architects and engineers in this special highlights their unique construction skills.

title: Animism
description: Meet five people who are romantically and physically attracted to inanimate objects, including the Eiffel Tower and a Ferris wheel.

title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
description: This CNN original series has chef Anthony Bourdain traveling to extraordinary locations around the globe to sample a variety of local cuisines.

title: APEX: The Story of the Hypercar
description: A visionary carmaker introduces his fuel-efficient, high-performance hypercar to a market filled with big-name competitors like Ferrari and Porsche.

title: Armistice
description: Professor David Reynolds applies fresh thinking to the now-familiar story of the 1918 armistice that effectively brought World War I to an end.

title: Asperger's Are Us
description: A comedy troupe of four friends on the autism spectrum prepares for a final show before its members go their separate ways.
actors: Noah Britton, Ethan Finlan, Jack Hanke, New Michael Ingemi

title: Audrie & Daisy
description: In this wrenching documentary, two teens are sexually assaulted by boys they considered friends, humiliated online and harassed by their communities.

title: Avec Eric
description: Chef Eric Ripert of Manhattan's Le Bernardin takes viewers inside his high-end kitchen and around the world in search of high-quality ingredients.

title: AWAKE, A Dream from Standing Rock
description: Capturing global attention, the Standing Rock Sioux Tribe leads a peaceful protest against an oil pipeline threatening the drinking water of millions.
